options.A: young patient with a history of CNS infection presents with fever and CSF pleocytosis. Cultures and gram stains are negative, and HSV PCR is also negative. What is the next step in management?

question_text: In a patient with HIV presenting with progressive multifocal leukoencephalopathy (PML), what is the recommended treatment?

options.A: HAART

question_text: Oculomasticatory myorhythmia is diagnosed by which of the following?

options.A: CSF analysis
patient presents with weight loss and fever. MRI shows a frontal epidural collection. What is the most likely diagnosis?

question_text: What is the duration of acyclovir that will most likely decrease the chance of HSV recurrence?

options.A: 21 days

young Indian lady, who works as a nurse, was brought by her friend complaining of a headache for a few days, then developed new-onset seizures. An MRI of the brain showed multiple cysts. What is the diagnosis?

question_text: An HIV patient has an MRI that is typical for toxoplasmosis. What is the recommended treatment?

options.A: Start trimethoprim-sulfamethoxazole

question_text: An HIV patient who is non-compliant with his medication has an MRI that showed non-enhanced posterior hyperintensities. What is the treatment?

options.A: HAART

question_text: Patient with decreased level of consciousness and signs of meningitis. CSF positive VDRL, how to treat?

options.A: IV Penicillin G 4g Q4hrs for 2 weeks

19-year-old man is hospitalized in a psychiatric ward after developing visual and auditory hallucinations. He has a seizure soon after being admitted and is transferred to the emergency room. There, he is postictal and noted to have a fever and meningeal signs. What is the most likely diagnosis?

question_text: Patient presented with bilateral facial weakness, and image of erythema migrans. He had a trip to the US for hiking. CSF was done, showed lymphocytosis, how to treat? (No doxycycline)

options.A: Ceftriaxone
patient from India is found to have schistosomiasis. What is the recommended treatment?

40-year-old man is seen in the emergency department for evaluation of retinal hemorrhage, hepatosplenomegaly, headache, fever every 3 days, and right arm weakness. On examination, his temperature is 38.1°C. He has some weakness of the right arm; otherwise, his examination is non-focal. He recently arrived from Africa. Which of the following is a highly diagnostic test?
female patient diagnosed with HIV came to the clinic for evaluation of possible associated peripheral neuropathy. What is the most common type of peripheral neuropathy associated with HIV?
patient presents with features of mucormycosis, including a black nasal mass with maxillary pain and bilateral cavernous sinus involvement. What is the mechanism of infection?

10- or 12-year-old female is brought by her family for complaints of progressive decline in school performance and abnormal behavior. Her family took her to a psychiatrist who prescribed antipsychotics. After that, her condition worsened and she became unresponsive. EEG showed periodic bursts. MRI of the brain showed large areas of a signal (diffuse cortical/subcortical) process. Which of the following is the most likely diagnosis?

question_text: In the same scenario of mucormycosis, what is the recommended treatment?

options.A: Fluconazole

question_text: In the case of HSV encephalitis, what is the recommended duration of Acyclovir treatment?

options.A: 14 days

young male presented with headache and fever. A CT of the brain was normal. A lumbar puncture was performed, and CSF analysis showed WBCs 48, RBCs 780, normal protein, and glucose. What is the most likely interpretation?
patient with meningitis, who came from Alhaj, was found to have meningococcal meningitis. What is the appropriate prophylactic antibiotic for close contacts?

young Saudi male, studying in Africa, just returned with symptoms of radiculopathy. CSF analysis showed eosinophilia, and MRI revealed hyperintense conus medullaris. Diagnosis of Schistosomiasis was confirmed by lab workup. What is the best treatment?
